about_the_game:
Barton Lynch Pro Surfing pits you against the world's top surfers in some of the world's most exotic locations. As you freely explore 12 legendary surfing beaches, ride the waves with unique controls, a range of weather conditions, and comprehensive customization tools.



Barton Lynch Pro Surfing is a true to life sports game that pits you against the world’s best surfers at the most exotic locations on the planet. The expansive world tour features an in-depth leaderboard and sports commentary, or if you prefer to free surf, simply cruise around the vast beaches at your leisure.

Cutting edge graphics meets hardcore physics and beautifully brutal waves. Pump control uses the wave’s power so you can surf faster and unlock more moves. More speed = more moves! Pump, smash that lip, get sooo barreled and launch airs from waves that barrel, peak, break left and right, or just foam crumble.

Customize your own character to your liking or play as some of today’s top pros, including: Yago Dora, Clay Marzo, Nathan Florence, Soli Bailey, Mahina Maeda, Vahine Fierro, Felicity Palmateer, and of course the legendary world champion, coach and Pro Surfing commentator Barton Lynch.

A MASSIVE CAREER MODE
Set out to conquer the world rankings in a singles career or via online ghost leaderboards. Manage your money, equipment, health and performance to reach the top. The Tour is a sporting challenge like no other, so be sure to leave it all out there in the waves.

MANY GAME MODES
Tour Modes, Free Surf, Trick Challenges – Barton Lynch Pro Surfing features endless hours of challenge and replayability. Featuring a set of progressive difficulties at each location helps you to build your skills and knowledge of the waves so you can take your real-time skills and start ripping it up in real life.

WORLD CHAMPS & UNDERGROUND HEAVYWEIGHTS
See how you compare to the big names on the tour, like Yago or Soli, or underground chargers like Nathan and Clay. Or what about taking on big wave chargers Vahine, Mahina or Felicity? Barton Lynch Pro Surfing features a wide range of surfers to test your mettle against.

CUSTOMIZABLE CHARACTERS
Customize your entire look down to the finest detail. Your choice of equipment impacts what happens in the game, with a variety of wetsuits, rashies, fins, board shorts, and board shapes including sizes, widths, bottom, tails, rails, noses – every item will have an effect on your performance out there on the waves.



To boot, Barton Lynch Pro Surfing features some of the most recognized surf brands like Billabong, Quiksilver, Roxy, MR Surfboards, Lost, Pyzel, ONeill, Creatures Of Leisure, Futures Fins, and many more.

REAL LIFE ICONIC LOCATIONS
Each location is based on an iconic surfing destination designed to take you wherever you want to be. From Snapper, Mundaka, to Pipeline or the Box – we’ve got you covered.



Should you rock off at Snapper or take your chances in the channel? Want to perfect that bottom to top backside snap before pulling in to get shacked at Hossegor? Now you can. Should you paddle big Jaws or Tow in? That’s a dilemma. But what about paddling from Main Break to the Box when it’s pumping? Yep, you can do that too.

CUSTOMIZABLE SURFING CONDITIONS – MADE FOR YOU, BY YOU
Use the sick weather tool to directly impact how you play in real-time. Big, sunny, low tide and glassy? You got it! Messy and small with a heavy cross-shore wind so you can practice your boosts? Yeah!

LEGIT SOUNDTRACK
Smoking Martha, Kilns, Oly Sherman, Wing Defence, Mesmeriser and Bad Pony headline the distinctive soundtrack that blends well with Barton Lynch Pro Surfing’s worldwide vibe and fluid physics-based control mechanics.

name: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 and Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350, Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card (NVIDIA): NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1050 / NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 660 2GB Graphics card (AMD): AMD Radeon™ RX 560 / HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Barton Lynch Pro Surfing pits you against the world’s best surfer’s at the most exotic locations on the planet. An in-depth leader-board sports game meets free surf exploration at 12 massive worlds. Get pumped by the unique control, amazing weather & customization tools.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
